search.related-word-forms-tooltip: Checking this box will exclude related word forms (of the same stem/lemma) in search results (e.g. 'eat, 'eaten', 'ate')
search.field-instructions: *These fields accept Roman or Yiddish characters.
search.author: Author
search.title: Title
search.document-reference-placeholder: Add document reference numbers separated by a comma

results.author: Author:
results.none: Uh-oh! Your query did not return any results
results.word-fix-instructions: (Double-click on a word to make an OCR correction)

navigation.back-tooltip: This button takes you back in your search history
navigation.forward-tooltip: This button takes you forward in your search history
navigation.clear-tooltip: This button will clear your search history

fix-word.title: Fix a word
fix-word.instructions: Please enter the word exactly as it appears above, including niqqud, apostrophes, quotes, dashes, and other punctuation. If the word is badly segmented (i.e. if only part of the word appears), do not correct it.
fix-word.unauthenticated: In order to fix a word, please login first.

fix-metadata.title: Fix document meta data
fix-metadata.unauthenticated: In order to fix document meta data, please login first.
